low_text: I have no phlegm (mucus) in my chest at all.
high_text: My chest is completely full of phlegm (mucus).

low_text: My chest does not feel tight at all.
When I walk up a hill or one flight of stairs I am not breathless.
high_text: When I walk up a hill or one flight of stairs I am very breathless.

low_text: I am not limited doing any activities at home.
high_text: I am very limited doing activities at home.

low_text: I am confident leaving my home despite my lung condition.
high_text: I am not at all confident leaving my home because of my lung condition.
I don't sleep soundly because of my lung condition.
I have no energy at all.
